summaries.summary: Focused on geleus.com redesign with automated weekly summaries, expandable READMEs on goodies page, and blog system. Contributed to OrderProtection repos including monolog and cart-widget.
highlights: pidoshva.github.io: built markdown blog system with no build step
pidoshva.github.io: added expandable README to goodies repo cards
pidoshva.github.io: automated weekly journal with GitHub Actions + Claude API
pidoshva.github.io: added contribution graph with green heatmap
